trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration element that specifies transaction flow support for a binding.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定的绑定的事务流支持的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.TransactionFlowElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.TransactionFlowElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether wildcard action is permitted.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许通配符操作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if wildcard action is permitted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果允许通配符操作;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Applies the content of this binding configuration section to the specified transaction flow binding element.
trans-unit.target: 将此绑定配置节的内容应用到指定的事务流绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally by the infrastructure when translating the configuration elements into binding settings.
trans-unit.target: 配置元素转换为绑定设置时，此方法是由基础结构内部进行调用。

trans-unit.source: A binding element of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 类型的绑定元素<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: bindingElement is .
trans-unit.target: bindingElementis .

trans-unit.source: bindingElement is not of type .
trans-unit.target: bindingElement类型不是 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Type> object that represents the type of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Type>对象，表示此配置元素的类型。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The type of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 此配置元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of the specified configuration section to this configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的配置节的内容复制到此配置节。

trans-unit.source: The configuration section to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的配置节。

trans-unit.source: from is .
trans-unit.target: fromis .

trans-unit.source: The configuration file is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件是只读的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement"></xref> object that has enabled transaction flow and uses the same <xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"></xref> as the current element.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement"></xref>对象，已启用事务流并使用相同<xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"></xref>与当前元素。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement"></xref> object that has enabled transaction flow, and uses the same <xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"></xref> as the current element
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement"> </xref>已启用事务流，并使用相同的对象<xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"></xref>与当前元素

trans-unit.source: Initializes this binding configuration section with the content of the specified binding element.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定的绑定元素的内容与此绑定配置节。

trans-unit.source: A binding element of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 类型的绑定元素<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: bindingElement is .
trans-unit.target: bindingElementis .

trans-unit.source: bindingElement is not of type .
trans-unit.target: bindingElement类型不是 。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref>实例，其中包含一套<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>可以是属性的对象或<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>此配置元素的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"></xref> instance that contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref> objects that can be attributes or <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref> objects of this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection"> </xref>实例，其中包含一套<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationProperty"></xref>可以是属性的对象或<xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement"></xref>此配置元素的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the transaction protocol to be used.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用的事务处理协议。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"></xref> that specifies the transaction protocol to be used for transaction flow.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol"> </xref> ，指定要用于事务流的事务协议。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.OleTransactions*>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.OleTransactions*>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.TransactionProtocol.OleTransactions*>
